title: जून की पहली तारीख से हर शनिवार को सभी बैंकों के बंद रहने का झूठा दावा वायरल
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Hi Prathik, we are open on the first and third Saturdays of the month. Branches will be closed on the second and fourth Saturday of every month. Weekday timings apply on working Saturdays. Branches will also be closed on Sundays and bank holidays. -Manoj
